attributes.action: Protect civilians and hospitals from Assad’s airstrikes. Ground his air force.
attributes.additional_details:
NGO-supported hospitals have repeatedly been targeted by Russian and Assad regime aircraft, resulting in the death of patients and medical staff and leaving entire towns without medical care. 
 
The Assad regime and its allies have broken the Cessation of Hostilities agreement just as they have flouted every UNSC resolution on Syria. Endless peace talks and words of condemnation are meaningless so long as Assad continues to murder populations with impunity. Civilians must be protected.
attributes.background: The deliberate, systematic and on-going targeting of civilians, medical facilities and humanitarian workers in opposition-held areas of Syria by Russian and Assad regime airstrikes constitute war crimes and crimes against humanity.

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition calling on the Government to take military action to achieve this.
